dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3678 IH: Pay Less at the Pump Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carey (for himself, Mr. Hern, Mr. Smith of Nebraska, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Estes, Mr. LaHood, and Mrs. Miller of West Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to terminate the Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Pay Less at the Pump Act.

section.header: Termination of Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate

subsection.text: Section 4611 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (as amended by section 13601 of Public Law 117–169) is amended by inserting after subsection (d) the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Application of Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate
subsection.text: The Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate under this section shall not apply after December 31, 2022.
Section 9507(d)(3)(B) of such Code (as so amended) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking December 31, 2032 and inserting the date of the enactment of the Pay Less at the Pump Act, and
by striking on or before such date and inserting on a quarterly basis from unobligated amounts available in such Fund until repaid in full.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on January 1, 2023.
The amendments made by subsection (b) shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act.
